checklists.breve: Very concise description of the checklist function
checklists.Descrizione: Short Description + **Purpose and Context** + **When to Apply**

Punti.Istruzioni: How to read the point of the single checklist, adding the context that is usually necessary to understand it
Punti.Punto: Point as reported on the checklist
Punti.Sezione: Section (if the checklist is divided into multiple sections)
